title: Eye Opener: Health experts say virus pandemic curve is flattening
description: Health experts are hopeful that the coronavirus pandemic curve is flattening as less people are being admitted to hospitals in hard-hit areas, though they warn that it's critical to not let up on mitigation efforts. Also, New York has reported a record high n…
